text: Bumthang District is one of the 20 districts in Bhutan. The administrative centre is Jakar. Bumthang District is divided into four village blocks: *Chhume Gewog *Choekor Gewog *Tang Gewog *Ura Gewog Notable towns include: *Chhumey *Prakhar *Tang *Ura Category:Districts of Bhutan
title: Bumthang District
